title: 9.1 Master Challenge 2
question:
Create a comprehensive inventory system that manages various types of products for a fashion retail store. The classes needed for this challenge are Products, Tshirts, Skirts, and Shoes.
● ProductsClass:This super class should hold common attributes for all products, including name, brand, price, and color.
● Tshirts Class:This sub class of size (S, M, L, XL, XXL) and must include additional attributes,such as (full or half ).
●Skirts Class: Extending and a Products,this class should also have a size attribute similar to attribute to hold values like short, medium, long, and full length.
● ShoesClass:Anothersubclassof ,theShoesclassisneededtoaccountfor size as an integer (8, 9, and so on) and (sneakers, sandals, and boots).

Be mindful of how the attributes are initialized in the constructors, and make sure that the attributes in the subclasses properly extend the attributes in the Products class without redundancy.

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
